chapters.title: Chapter 4: Twilight
chapters.info: Melaine, p. 124 (89)—Aiel Wise One of the Jhirad sept of the Goshien Aiel. She is a Dreamwalker, and one of Egwene's teachers. She can channel. She swore she would never love a man, but changed her mind later and married Bael, her clan chief, thus becoming sister-wife to Dorindha. See also Bael; Dorindha.
